blocks.data:
# Visibility

Visibility allows the user to toggle between showing or hiding an element.

## JSON Schema

type.description: The type of setting component to display.

label.description: The user friendly message to inform the user how this setting will be used.

id.description: The variable name where the setting value will be available in the widget template.

default.description: The default value to use when rendering the widget for the first time. Default values are "show or "hide".

blocks.data:
Output values are "show" or "hide".

## User Interface Output
